definition[0]: a system used to connect telephone calls in an office building, hotel etc, or the people who operate the system
example[1]: Hundreds of callers jammed the switchboard trying to win the tickets  (=there were too many calls for the switchboard to deal with).
definition[1]: a system used to connect telephone calls in an office building, hotel etc
example[2]: Calls must pass through the switchboard with the minimum delay.
example[3]: Contact theswitchboard operator to arrange an early morning call.
